ETYMOLOGY: From Turkish 'sofa', which is from Arabic 'ṣuffah' (bench, raised platform).

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things (common noun), or to name a particular one of these (proper noun).
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A long upholstered seat with a back and arms, for more than one person.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 一种带靠背和扶手的长软垫座椅，可供多人坐。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: We bought a comfortable new sofa for our living room.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 我们为客厅买了一张舒适的新沙发。
